arg.name: activities
arg.tp:docstring:
An array of structs containing:
the identifier of the activity
the room handle of the activity channel

tp:docstring.p: Return all the activities of this view
Return all the buddies of this view

Close the view so we won't receive notifications about its result anymore. Method calls on the view are no longer valid after this call, and the connection manager may remove the object from the bus at any point.

signal.tp:docstring: Signal emitted when the activities in the view are changed.

signal.name: BuddiesChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Signal emitted when the buddies in the view are changed.

signal.name: Closed
signal.tp:docstring: Signal emitted when the view is closed. Views are closed on users request (Close method) or if the gadget server component is restarted.

tp:docstring.p: An object representing the result of an search.
Buddy properties changes are notified on the Connection object using the org.laptop.Telepathy.BuddyInfo interface while the view object is alive.
Activity properties changes are notified on the Connection object using the org.laptop.Telepathy.ActivityProperties interface while the view object is alive.
Activities membership is notified on the Connection object using the org.laptop.Telepathy.BuddyInfo properties while the view object is alive.
